snippet: The move to improve air quality is a response to the dense smog that has repeatedly enveloped Beijing and other major Chinese cities in recent years.
abstract: China’s cabinet adopts 10 measures to improve country's air quality, including mandate that heavy polluters release detailed environmental information to general public.
lead_paragraph: The move to improve air quality is a response to the dense smog that has repeatedly enveloped Beijing and other major Chinese cities in recent years.

headline.main: China Sets New Rules Aimed at Curbing Air Pollution
headline.print_headline: China Sets New Rules Aimed at Curbing Air Pollution
